languages.french: Je vais au marché pour acheter des légumes.
languages.english: I am going to the market to buy vegetables.
languages.italian: Vado al mercato per comprare verdure.

languages.french: Elle cherche des vêtements en solde.
languages.english: She is looking for clothes on sale.

languages.french: Le soleil brille, c'est une belle journée.
languages.english: The sun is shining, it's a beautiful day.
languages.italian: Il sole splende, è una bella giornata.

languages.french: Je prends mon petit déjeuner à 8 heures.
Nous allons à l'école en bus tous les matins.
languages.english: We go to school by bus every morning.
languages.italian: Andiamo a scuola in autobus ogni mattina.
